org.apache.hadoop.io.compress

类 Lz4Codec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.Lz4Codec
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Configurable, CompressionCodec

    public class Lz4Codec
extends Object
implements Configurable, CompressionCodec
    This class creates lz4 compressors/decompressors.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CompressionCodec
